desc: Operation Sealion - your dedicated online store for DUST 1947 figures in the UK. Paolo Parente's art comes vividly to the tabletop in this 28mm skirmish wargame of a WW2 with zombies, tesla tanks and ninja schoolgirls. Towering over all, mighty armored walkers that rule the battlefield from Antarctica to Zverograd

layout.text: Operation Sealion - the UK's Dust: 1947 store!
WW2 armies clash with the Cthulhu Mythos in Paolo Parente's alternate history skirmish miniature game of mecha and monsters.
